评论概述: Nice & Lightweight Alternative to Traditional Nigerian Attire
评论详情: I reluctantly purchased this as a last minute option. I usually have my Nigerian outfits custom made in Nigeria or purchased ready-to-wear from Nigerian tailors; however, time did not permit for the timeframe in which I needed an all-black outfit by. The sizing is very accurate!  The pants length was fine but if I had more time, I may have hemmed slightly just to bring to the ankle as a personal preference; otherwise, it was perfect and no issue! The material is thinner than traditional fabric but this also made the outfit more comfortable. I will not make it a habit to buy Nigerian outfits from Amazon (aka Made in China) because I believe in supporting Nigerian tailors and artisans; however, if you are in a pinch, this is the way to go!
